## Background

Maggie Rouin is a first year graduate student in the Professional Science Masters program at Colorado State University studying Water Resources. Prior to attending CSU, she worked in environmental consulting for four years in water resources and renewable resources. Maggie hopes to work in water quality research following the completion of her masters degree. When she's not studying or working, Maggie spends most of her time in nature either trail running, snowboarding, or cycling. She is also an avid baker and loves to spoil her dog, Kaya.
